questions.question: They decided to postpone _______ the house until next year.
The government is determined to _______ inflation.
He is very anxious _______ the result of the examination.
If she _______, she would have certainly come to the party.
They worked hard _______ they might pass the final exam.
The proposal was eventually _______ down by the committee.
The more you practise speaking, _______ your fluency will be.
We were delayed by a _______ traffic jam.
The meeting was cancelled because of the chairman's sudden _______.
The new manager is very polite and _______ to his staff.
The students are looking forward _______ their summer holiday.
They offered her the job _______ her lack of experience.
He asked me _______ the previous day.
The children found the story very _______.
Mark: “What a beautiful dress you have!” – Helen: “_______”
answers: Thank you. I’m glad you like it.

questions.question: Peter: “Do you mind if I borrow your bike?” – Jane: “_______”
Synonym: The 18th Asian Games was a **memorable** event.
Synonym: He was **fully aware** of the implications.
Antonym: Due to the **scarcity** of food...
Antonym: The manager **turned down** the request.
Tìm lỗi sai: Despite being warned..., **but** the divers continued
Tìm lỗi sai: The boy is always playing games after he **has finished** his homework.
Tìm lỗi sai: Neither her mother **or** her father knows...
She bought a _______ dress for the party.
The heavy rain has led to widespread _______.
If I were you, I _______ that old car immediately.
It is obligatory for you to submit the report by Friday.
answers: You must submit the report by Friday.
You may submit the report by Friday.
You should submit the report by Friday.

questions.question: The last time she visited her grandparents was three months ago.
answers: She hasn’t visited her grandparents for three months.
She last visited her grandparents since three months.
She visited her grandparents since three months.

questions.question: Phát âm khác: cat, hat, man, wash
Trọng âm khác: comfortable, develop, environment, familiar
